title: Minimalists Enclosure
description: Compact studio in a quiet location with sleek, simple finishes and just enough space to exist.

title: The Peeling Place
description: Two-bedroom apartment in a questionable area with a bathroom that’s definitely seen some things.

title: Zen Den
description: Cozy four-bedroom retreat with soft lighting, calming vibes, and just enough space for inner peace.

title: Window Walls
description: Bright and airy two-bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows, offering amazing views (and zero privacy).

title: K-9 Smell
description: Pet-friendly one-bedroom with built-in doggy door and a mysterious scent that refuses to leave.

title: Moldy Meadow
description: Spacious two-bedroom with “natural” wall textures, a musty aroma, and a thriving ecosystem in the bathroom.

title: Squeaky Steppings
description: Upper-level three-bedroom with charming hardwood floors that announce your every movement.

title: The Echo Chamber
description: Loft-style apartment with high ceilings and acoustics so powerful, your thoughts will sound like a TED Talk.

title: Pest Nest
description: Budget-friendly studio with “complimentary” tiny roommates that never pay rent.

title: Insect Defect
description: One-bedroom with “newly renovated” extermination attempts and a lease that includes a can of bug spray.
